org.gvsig.fmap.mapcontrol.tools.Listeners

Interface ToolListener

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CircleListener, PanListener, PointListener, PolylineListener, RectangleListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPointListener, AbstractToolListener, AreaListener, AreaListenerImpl, AttributeEditorPointListener, BaseMapTool, CircleMeasureListener, CircleSelectionListener, CircleSelectListener, ClippingMouseViewListener, ClippingPanelListener, DrawMouseViewListener, EmptyPanListener, GeoprocessPointSelectionListener, GeorefPanListener, GeorefPanListenerImpl, InfoByPixelPointViewTool, InfoByPixelPointViewTool, InfoListener, LinkListener, MapOverviewChangeZoomListener, MapOverviewListener, MapOverviewPanListener, MeasureListener, MeasureListenerImpl, PanListener, PanListenerImpl, PointSelectionListener, PointSelectListener, PolygonSelectionListener, PolygonSelectListener, PolyLineSelectionListener, PolyLineSelectListener, RectangleSelectionListener, RectangleSelectListener, ResolutionLevelListener, SaveRasterListener, SaveRasterListenerImpl, SaveRasterRectangleTool, SelectImageListener, SelectImageListenerImpl, SelectImageListImpl, SelectRGBListener, StatusBarListener, StreetViewListener, ToolSelectGraphic, TranspByPixelStatusBarListener, WCSZoomPixelCursorListener, ZoomInListener, ZoomInListenerImpl, ZoomOutListener, ZoomOutListenerImpl, ZoomOutRightButtonListener, ZoomPixelCursorListener

    public interface ToolListener

    User can interact with a MapControl instance, working with a tool that applies changes on it processing the events produced by the current Behavior of MapControl.

    The process that the tool applies on the MapControl is a consequence of the mouse actions that user has done on that area.

    Only some tool listener can be cancelled.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean cancelDrawing()
      Determines if the drawing process that this tool executes on the MapControl instance could be canceled or not.
      Image getImageCursor()
      Gets the Cursor associated to this tool.

    • Method Detail

      • getImageCursor

        Image getImageCursor()

        Gets the Cursor associated to this tool.

        Returns:
        component with the bitmap associated to this tool

      • cancelDrawing

        boolean cancelDrawing()

        Determines if the drawing process that this tool executes on the MapControl instance could be canceled or not.

        Returns:
        true if is cancellable; otherwise returns false
